CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Ingersoll-Rand, Inc. was formed through the merger of Gardner Denver and Ingersoll-Rand PLC's industrial segment. The firm's portfolio consists of two business lines: industrial technologies & services and precision & science technologies. Ingersoll-Rand serves a variety of end markets, including industrial, medical, and energy. Its broad portfolio of products includes compression, blower and vacuum, and fluid management. Ingersoll-Rand generated roughly $5.2 billion in revenue in 2021.

value.name: Matthew J. Emmerich
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
